      • CustomPanelDistributionMovieController

        public CustomPanelDistributionMovieController​(CustomPanelDistributionMovie aCustomPanelDistributionMovie,
                                              java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService anExecutorService,
                                              ImageFileType anImageFileType,
                                              TimeStepInfo[] aTimeStepInfoArray,
                                              ValueItemContainer aJobInputValueItemContainer,
                                              VolumeFrequency.VolumeAxis anVolumeAxis,
                                              JobResult.ParticleType aParticleType,
                                              java.lang.String aParticleTypeDescriptionString)
                                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor. Sets up the slider, adds action listener and starts the distribution calculation tasks
        Parameters:
        aCustomPanelDistributionMovie - Panel this controller is made for
        anExecutorService - Executor service for the distribution calculation tasks
        anImageFileType - File type for movie images
        aTimeStepInfoArray - Array with information for simulation steps
        aJobInputValueItemContainer - Value item container with the job input
        anVolumeAxis - Axis along which the distribution is calculated
        aParticleType - Type of particle that is examined
        aParticleTypeDescriptionString - String describing the particle that is examined
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
